name: Falkonir: Pre-Alpha
description:
Feedback form: https://forms.gle/P53KJuEcvmGDF1tAA

Falkonir is a cooperative action-adventure game with asymmetric combat and spacial puzzles. Play as Aella, a Falkonir, or Horu, her Falcon, as you work together to explore a devastated magical mountain and end the source of its corruption.

This is a pre-Alpha playtest of Falkonir; a game in-development at the University of Wisconsin-Stout

This is a two player game, therefore: 1 Controller + 1 Keyboard  required. If the game runs slow on your system please go to the main menu -> options -> display -> and reduce the graphics settings. 

Build004 is the correct build, Build003 is an older version.
